articles.author: RT
articles.title: First child dies in France from rare Kawasaki-like disease unwisely linked to Covid-19 - RT
articles.description: A nine-year-old boy in France has died from the mysterious Kawasaki-like disease, which some medics link to Covid-19. It’s the first such case in that country, but similar child fatalities were earlier recorded in the US and UK.
articles.content:
The cause of the boy’s death was “neurological injury related to a cardiac arrest,” Fabrice Michel, head of the pediatric intensive care unit at La Timone hospital in Marseille, said.
